i1.name: Bop 'n' Block
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Periodically, '''Yuumi's''' next [[basic attack]] against an enemy {{tip|champion}} becomes an {{tip|unstoppable basic attack}}, gains {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}} and becomes a {{tip|projectile|non-projectile}}. This attack restores {{sti|mana|}}{{as|{{pp|50 to 160}}|mana}} {{as|mana}} and grants her a {{pp2|60+10*(x-1) for 3; then +15*x for 4; then +20*x for 7; then + 30*x}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{tip|shield}} that lasts until it is broken.
While {{ai|You and Me!|Yuumi|Attached}}, the shield transfers to her ''Anchor''.
i1.notes:
* This ability will apply to a basic attack already in flight, but will not augment it into a non-projectile.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Bop 'n' Block's'' interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodge}}, {{ai|Spirit's Refuge|Shen|block}}, {{tip|blind}}).

q1.name: Prowling Projectile
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yuumi''' fires an errant missile in the target direction that deals {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to the first enemy hit.
If the missile is in flight for 1 second, it deals increased {{as|magic damage}}, and {{tip|slow|slows}} enemy {{tip|champions}} struck by 20% for 1 second.

While {{ai|You and Me!|Yuumi|Attached}}, '''Yuumi''' instead directs the trajectory of the missile using the cursor for up to 2 seconds before fizzling, during which she and the ''Anchor'' can see the effective range. This cannot be done while channeling {{ai|Final Chapter|Yuumi}}.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Empowered Damage|{{ap|45 to 245 6}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|2 to 8 6}}% of the target's '''current''' health)}}}}
effects.str: • Empowered Damage: (+ 40% AP) (+ % of the target's current health)

st_slices: (+ 40% AP) (+ % of the target's '''current''' health)

subeffects.title: Empowered Damage
subeffects.str: (+ 40% AP) (+ % of the target's '''current''' health)

w1.name: You and Me!
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Yuumi''' and her ''Anchor'' gain flat {{tip|Adaptive force|adaptive force}} plus a percentage of the ''Anchor's'' {{tip|Adaptive force|adaptive force}} and a percentage of their {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}} or {{sti|{{as|ability power}}}}, whichever is higher, as {{tip|Adaptive force|adaptive force}}. Additionally, '''Yuumi''' starts with a point in ''You and Me!'' and {{ai|Prowling Projectile|Yuumi}} instead has 6 ranks.

{{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|0.25}}-second {{tip|channel}}, '''Yuumi''' {{tip|dashes}} to an {{tt|allied champion|The Anchor}} and {{tip|Attached|attaches}} to them. This dash is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} by {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} effects. While attached, '''Yuumi''' follows her ''Anchor's'' movement, becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, (except from {{tip|turrets}} and in-flight {{tip|projectile|projectiles}} [[unit-targeted|targeting]] her) and casts her spells from the ''Anchor's'' position. The cooldown starts ticking down upon attaching to the first ''Anchor''. ''You and Me!'' can be recast after {{fd|0.5}} seconds of the attachment.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Yuumi''' can switch her ''Anchor'' at no cooldown, and will ''detach'' automatically if her ''Anchor'' dies or under {{tt|certain circumstances|In the notes below}}. If recast without a valid target, '''Yuumi''' will ''detach'' from her ''Anchor'' and dash up to 250 units in the target direction, putting the ability on cooldown.
''You and Me!'' is placed on a 5-second cooldown if '''Yuumi''' is {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} or {{tip|ground|grounded}}.
w1.notes:
* The ability name for the recast is ''Change of Plan''.
*''You and Me!'' does not count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}}, charging {{ii|Spellbinder}}, and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
**{{ci|Kassadin}} cannot gain a stack for {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}} while '''Yuumi''' is {{tip|untargetable}}.
* '''Yuumi''' will automatically detach in specific circumstances:
** When her ''Anchor'' starts a {{si|Teleport}} channel. 
** After the ''Anchor'' completes a {{si|Recall}} channel.
** Entering {{tip|resurrection}}.
** Her ''Anchor'' is sent to the {{ai|Realm of Death|Mordekaiser}}.
** She is pulled by {{ai|Fate's Call|Kalista}}.
* The {{tip|dash}} has a maximum following range. If her target is too far away before the attachment, the ''dash'' is interrupted and ''You and Me!'' goes on cooldown.
* If '''Yuumi''' is hit by a delayed [[area of effect]] ability (e.g. {{ai|Chum the Waters|Fizz}}, {{ai|Last Embrace|Senna}}, {{ai|Time Bomb|Zilean}}) or is emitting an [[aura]] effect (e.g. {{ai|Wild Growth|Lulu}}, {{ii|Bami's Cinder}}) and she attaches to an ally, the effect occurs from the ''Anchor's'' position instead.
** Delayed [[Single target|single-targeted]] abilities do not transfer to the ''Anchor'' (e.g. {{ai|Death Mark|Zed}}, {{ai|Umbral Trespass|Kayn}}).
* Her {{tip|monster}} aggression transfers to the ''Anchor''.
* Enemies gain an assist on '''Yuumi''' if they damaged the ''Anchor''.
* '''Yuumi''' gains assists on champion {{tip|takedown|takedowns}} from her ''Anchor''.
* '''Yuumi''' will also become {{tip|stealth|stealthed}} if her ''Anchor'' does, and can cast her own abilities without breaking the stealth.
* '''Yuumi''' can channel the {{ii|Eye of the Herald}} while attached.
* If '''Yuumi''' is on the blue team, she will remain attached on the southwest side; if '''Yuumi''' is on the red team, she will remain on the northeast. While channeling {{ai|Final Chapter|Yuumi}}, she will be behind her ''Anchor''.
* '''Yuumi''' can dash to targetable {{tip|zombie state}} allies (currently only {{cai|Glory in Death|Sion}}), but she cannot stay attached for long.
* '''Yuumi''' doesn't ''detach'' instantly when her ''Anchor'' dies. There's a small grace period in which she can recast ''You and Me!'' to attach to another champion without the {{tip|channel}}.
* The [[Summoner|player's]] screen will briefly flash red if '''Yuumi''' is affected by a {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} or {{tip|ground|grounding}} effect, or if she forcibly detaches from her ''Anchor''.
* The ''Anchor's'' [[health bar]] will have a different frame to indicate the ''attached'' status:
[[File: Yuumi Health Bar.png|200px|center]]
* This following table refers for interactions while '''Yuumi''' is attached:
{{ct|move=false|cast=true|attack=false|items=true, true, true, false|spells=true, false, false, false, false|interrupts=death}}

e1.name: Zoomies
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yuumi''' {{tip|heals}} herself and gains {{as|15%|movement speed}} {{as|(+ 10% per 100 AP)}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed|ms}}}} and {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 3 seconds.
While {{ai|You and Me!|Yuumi|Attached}}, the ''Anchor'' is targeted by the ability instead.

effects.str:
• Heal: (+ 40% AP)

  • Bonus Attack Speed: %

r1.name: Final Chapter
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yuumi''' and ''Book'' {{tip|channel}} for {{fd|3.5}} seconds, launching 7 waves in the target direction over the duration each dealing {{as|magic damage}}. Enemy {{tip|champions}} hit take only 50% damage from subsequent waves, and when struck with three waves, they are {{tip|root|rooted}} for {{fd|1.75}} seconds, this can only occur once per target.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Magic Damage Per Wave|{{ap|60 to 100}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Reduced Damage Per Wave|{{ap|60*0.5 to 100*0.5}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}}|Maximum Champion Damage|{{ap|60*4 to 100*4}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}|Maximum Non-Champion Damage|{{ap|60*7 to 100*7}} {{as|(+ 140% AP)}}}}
